attributes.action: sack any mp who has made any form of profit on any form of expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any mp who has made a profit on anything they have claimed for on their expenses or on their second homes should be sacked immediately.the allowances are not about making money.it is only meant to help them complete their duties whilst in london.nothing more nothing less.proof of profit means the sack!

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
